alert.note: Alert for Wyandotte (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 13 at 7:12PM CDT until August 13 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN WYANDOTTE...SOUTHERN CLAY...SOUTHEASTERN PLATTE AND NORTHWESTERN JACKSON COUNTIES... At 712 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Avondale, or over Claycomo, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Kansas City, Independence, Lee`s Summit, Blue Springs, Raytown, Liberty, Gladstone, North Kansas City, Sugar Creek, Riverside, Claycomo, Kansas City Kansas, Courtney, Pleasant Valley, Lake Waukomis, Lake Tapawingo, Glenaire, Avondale, Oakview and Sibley. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Missouri between mile markers 0 and 19. Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 422 and 423. Interstate 35 in Missouri between mile markers 1 and 17. Interstate 29 between mile markers 0 and 5. Interstate 635 between mile markers 6 and 12. Interstate 470 between mile markers 13 and 16. Interstate 435 between mile markers 47 and 63. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
